Revision History
===============
## 2023.2 Release

* Plain Upgrade

## 2023.1 Release

* Recovered clock logic is added to the design to support syncE.
* Enabled XXV MAC User Register to reset GT QPLL.
* In the axi_dma_hier, axis_rxd_fifo and axis_txd_fifo depths are reduced to 8K to minimize Resource Utilization.
* Resource utilization graph is updated.

## 2022.2 Release

* First Release
